text: to me psychological safety is not to
feel comfortable all the time but to
be comfortable even in uncomfortable
situations
there are many ways of facilitating
retrospectives but i am aware that
some ways are better than others which
is why i wrote the book a lot of the
practice is actually creating
safe discomfort i mean maybe i just read
it as a book of my mistakes
a future perspective is where you draw a
timeline from
from now until when the project ends or
christmas or a few months
in the future they are afraid that
people will find out that they're
actually just still
kids with bigger shoes and huge house
loans
my future hope is that people will
actually
talk to each other share experiences
learn from that in a curious and open
and positive way
and then we don't need retrospectives
anymore
[Music]

now for ad-free videos released almost
daily
and join the experts in person or online
at any upcoming go to conference
using the promo code book club visit
